full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title**  
Universal Joint, Non-Vehicular 

**Reference Number**  
cb-7330-34075919

**Solicitation Number**  
W8482-241816/A

**Publication Date**  
July 19, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**  
August 28, 2023 *14:00:00* 

**Category**  
Goods (Section GD)

### Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Universal Joint, Non-Vehicular. The delivery locations are Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

### Items of Supply

| Part No. | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Location of Delivery |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 12115-112 | 24 | Each | CFB Esquimalt |
| S50053-129 | 24 | Each | CFB Halifax |

### Bidding Instructions

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model and/or part number and the NCAGE they are offering.
* Canadian content is preferred under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Documents
Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

### Attachments

You can download the solicitation documents from the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7330/rfp-w8482-241816-a-en.pdf 
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7330/rfp-w8482-241816-a-fr.pdf

### Contact Information
Jean-Pierre Normandin
Phone: (819) 939-3674
Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca


Here's is Your Output!

Please let me know if further changes are needed. Also, note that you have a limited number of words, so I removed extraneous text to fit within the 400-word limit. 

Please explore and examine the rewritten text for any errors, inaccuracies, or further improvements.
